entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Edmonton (Int'l Aprt)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmonton Int'l Airport 10:48 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: S 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Clearing near midnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 9:56 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:56 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
